1187640.name: Totemic
1187640.description:
Totemic is an action-adventure game set in a beautiful pixel art world. You play as Mara, a young woman equipped with an enchanted axe and the ability to absorb her foes powers and use them as her own.

Help Mara explore the lore-rich world, defeat powerful bosses, master incredible magical abilities, and solve intriguing puzzles to help you learn the secrets of Mara's heritage.

Totemic includes a fast-paced real-time combat system. Switch between Mara’s different forms to access different skills and attacks to save the world from impending doom.
1187640.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 日语, 韩语, 俄语, 简体中文, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲
